name: Barrel of Scavs
description: Makes creature dens slightly more forgiving.<LINE><LINE>- Prey cannot drag predators into dens, so baby centipedes can't accidentally eat you.<LINE>- Creatures drop everything when they are dragged into dens, so a kelp monster eating your lizard captor will free you instead of eating you too.<LINE><LINE>Code at github.com/Dual-Iron/barrel-of-scavs
